'''Yanfei'''{{Lang|zh=烟绯|zh_rm=Yānfēi}} is a playable {{Pyro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

One of the few [[Illuminated Beast|half-illuminated-beasts]] who have not signed a contract with [[Rex Lapis]], Yanfei nevertheless works for the betterment of [[Liyue]] as a premier legal adviser who values fairness.
